string.value: At #b#m261000000##k, there's a fairy that seems to always wear a sad face, #b#p2111004##k. I wonder what really saddens her.

#p2111004# says although her daughter #p2111005# may seem exuberant and lively on the outside, she is very much concerned about her failing health. She wants to cure her declining health by acquiring medicine from #b#p2012018##k of #b#m200000000##k.
#p2012018# seems to know something about #p2111004#. Maybe he'll help #p2111004# out.
Ahh... What should I do... I wish he was here right now, so he can help me with this... what should I do...

Ah... are you a traveler? It's really hard to find anyone willing to travel to Magatia... Nice to meet you. The kid you see right there is my daughter, and her name is #p2111005#. She may have an ever-present smile on her face, but she is actually a very sick child.
Even our best magcian, the president of the Zenumist Society, told me he can't do anything about #p2111005#. Alcadno? ...Alcadno wouldn't want to do anything with the kid... I don't know what to do .

If I could get a hold of him, then he could very well help... but it's so hard to contact him... Ah! Excuse me, but have you ever been to #b#m200000000##k? If you have, then can you do me a big favor?

Do you know of #b#p2012018##k at #m200000000#? He is very proficient with Fairy potions, and I'd like for him to help us out. I know he's capable of curing #p2111005#. If it's about #p2111004#, then I am sure he'll help out, no questions asked. Please visit him and ask for me, okay?
It must be a difficult favor to ask. I see... sigh, what should I do, what should I do...
Hmm...? What is it? I am busy right now. I have to play with Nero... what? You're here on behalf of #p2111004#? Do you even know who #p2111004# is?!
Haven't you gone to see #b#p2012018##k yet? He's at #b#m200000000##k....
Ah... you must have lost the letter. I can always write another one for you, as long as you promise me you'll deliver it to #p2012018#.
